title: Books about typefaces
content:
Hello everyone! I am a new one!  
can someone give me some advice ?  
I am writing an academic paper about typography and mass media. This theme also includes all information about typefaces. I have aldeady read a book, by Robert Bringhurst, but I would like to go further on this issue. So I found three books, those ones:

[http://www.amazon.com/Just-My-Type-About-Fonts/dp/1592406521/ref=cm\_cmu\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141222/http:/www.amazon.com/Just-My-Type-About-Fonts/dp/1592406521/ref=cm_cmu_pg__header "http://www.amazon.com/Just-My-Type-About-Fonts/dp/1592406521/ref=cm\_cmu\_pg\_\_header")

[http://www.amazon.com/Thinking-Type-2nd-revised-expanded/dp/1568989695/r...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141222/http:/www.amazon.com/Thinking-Type-2nd-revised-expanded/dp/1568989695/ref=pd_sim_b_2 "http://www.amazon.com/Thinking-Type-2nd-revised-expanded/dp/1568989695/ref=pd\_sim\_b\_2")

[http://www.amazon.com/Anatomy-Typeface-Alexander-S-Lawson/dp/B005MWKQQ4](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141222/http:/www.amazon.com/Anatomy-Typeface-Alexander-S-Lawson/dp/B005MWKQQ4 "http://www.amazon.com/Anatomy-Typeface-Alexander-S-Lawson/dp/B005MWKQQ4")

,but I haven't choosen yet which one is more appropriate to give me more details about the uses of typefaces. Has anybody know those books?
author: desi87

comments.content:
Welcome.

I do not recommend 'Just My Type.' I couldn't finish it. ( [Relevant review](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141222/http:/www.salon.com/2011/09/20/just_my_type_imprint/))

I haven't read 'Anatomy of a Typeface.' (But I plan to at some point.)

Of these three, 'Thinking With Type' would give you more details about the uses of typefaces. I think ' [Shaping Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317141222/http:/www.amazon.com/Shaping-Text-Type-Typography-Reader/dp/9063692234/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1361638565&sr=1-1&keywords=Shaping+Text)' is an even better introductory text.

Good luck!

So how is this coming along?
